summary: Driven and enthusiastic Full-Stack Web Developer with a background in engineering, equipped with proficiency in front-end and back-end technologies, frameworks, and databases. Completed Full Stack Development Course with MERN Stack Development from GUVI, Chennai. Experienced in project management, problem-solving, and teamwork. Eager to contribute effectively towards organizational goals while continuously honing skills in the dynamic landscape of web development.

certifications.title: Full Stack Development Course with MERN Stack Development

highlights: Conducted RFQ follow-ups, price quoting, and negotiations for new products.
Assisted in cost reduction initiatives and monitored sales activities.
Collaborated with production teams to meet customer demands.
Regular customer follow-up on supply chain activities.
Managed design, manufacturing, and inspection of components based on GD&T.
Oversaw process planning, vendor selection, and production planning.
Streamlined component assembly and maintained material specifications.

education.institution: Karunya Institute of Technology and Sciences
